product_name: Nalgene Zippered Water Bottle Insulator - 32 fl. oz.
long_description: Keep liquids hot or cold longer with the Nalgene Zippered water bottle insulator. Molded top zips closed for complete protection. Attach the holder to a backpack waistbelt via the large stretchy loop; webbing loop allows you to clip the holder to your pack using an accessory carabiner (sold separately). Designed to hold a wide-mouth 32 fl. oz. water bottle (sold separately).
short_description: Keep liquids hot or cold longer with the Nalgene Zippered water bottle insulator.
